column5: Picked some up at BPS and thinking of spooling it up.  8lb test for drop-shotting, finesssing worms  and casting cranks.  Thoughts before I spool it up?
Thanks, I was on my blackberry and couldn't search
i personally like the stuff!   Would recommend it to anyone!

Yes it is a good choice I have my down rigger rods spooled with it used it in Quinte with my planer boards believe me the walleye were not line shy with the P-Line.  I like the quality of their products.  Mike
This will be my 3rd or 4th year using it, I've had no problems, bas to 6lbs on it Richard
